info.name: Bill Munshi API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for the Bill Munshi project - A comprehensive solution for bill management, expense tracking, and accounting integration with Tally and Zoho.

item.name: API Status
item.description: Health check and system status endpoints

request.description: Check if the API is operational
Get the current API version information
Get detailed system status (requires authentication)
Register a new user
Authenticate user and get JWT tokens
Get a new access token using refresh token
Request a password reset link
Confirm password reset with token
Change password while authenticated
Verify user email with token
Get current user profile information
List all organizations the user has access to
Create a new organization
Get details of a specific organization
Update organization details
List all members of an organization
Add a new member to the organization
Remove a member from the organization
Update a member's role in the organization
List all API keys for the organization
Issue a new API key for the organization
Revoke an API key
List all modules enabled for the organization
Enable or disable a module for the organization
Get the catalog of available modules
List all available subscription plans
Get details of a specific plan
List all subscriptions the user has access to
Get details of a specific subscription
Create a new subscription
Get subscription details for a specific organization

item.name: Dashboard
item.description: Dashboard endpoints for analytics and insights

Get funnel analysis data
Get top vendors data

Get health status of integrations
Get usage statistics

Generate Zoho access token from authorization code

List chart of accounts from Zoho Books
Sync chart of accounts from Zoho Books

Sync taxes from Zoho Books
List TDS/TCS from Zoho Books
Sync TDS/TCS from Zoho Books
List vendor bills
Upload a new vendor bill
Get details of a vendor bill
Analyze a vendor bill with OCR
Verify vendor bill details
Sync a verified vendor bill to Zoho Books
List expense bills

Get details of an expense bill
Analyze an expense bill with OCR
Verify expense bill details
Sync a verified expense bill to Zoho Books

Update a Tally configuration
Delete a Tally configuration
List ledgers from Tally
Create a new ledger in Tally
List vendor bills for Tally

List expense bills for Tally
Create a new expense bill for Tally

item.name: Tally Vendor Bills
item.description: Manage vendor bills in Tally with complete workflow

request.description: Get a list of all vendor bills for the organization
Upload a new vendor bill file (PDF or image)
Get details of a specific vendor bill
Analyze a vendor bill using AI to extract invoice data
Verify and update extracted vendor bill data
Sync a verified vendor bill to Tally ERP
Delete a vendor bill

item.name: Tally Expense Bills
item.description: Manage expense bills in Tally with complete workflow

request.description: Get a list of all expense bills for the organization
Upload a new expense bill file (PDF or image)
Get details of a specific expense bill
Analyze an expense bill using AI to extract expense data
Verify and update extracted expense bill data
Sync a verified expense bill to Tally ERP
Delete an expense bill
